name: astroturfer

scripts.build: npm run clean && rm -rf ./client/js && rm -rf ./ts-out && tsc && npx webpack && node hingler-party/copyProjectResources.ts client && node hingler-party/copyProjectResources.ts ./test && cp -r hingler-party/test/data ./test/data
